extendedInfo.description: The lightning fast free AFL live scores app. Get all your AFL updates on the go, including: * Instant score updates and goal kickers. * The latest news, weather forecast injuries, odds, expert tips, winning streak and tipping trends (from footytips.com.au) for every game. * The AFL ladder and win/loss history for teams. * Enter your tips for Australia's No. 1 tipping site - footytips.com.au. * The latest AFL news from the major news outlets. Bought to you by the team from footytips.com.au, this app is all you need for your AFL fix. We've got all the AFL teams covered, including: Adelaide Crows, Brisbane Lions, Carlton, Collingwood, Essendon, Fremantle Dockers, Geelong cats, Hawthorn Hawks, Melbourne, North Melbourne, Port Adelaide, Richmond Tigers, St Kilda, Sydney Swans, West Coast Eagles and Western Bulldogs.

reviews.title: Has potential..
reviews.comment: Dear developers, I have personally used this app for quite some time now. It is very simple but could be vastly improved in the following ways: 1. Removing the small buttons to switch from round to round. Wouldn\'t the ability to swipe across back & forth be much simpler and clean-cut?? 2. Giving team icons more functionality; by clicking on a clubs icon you should be able to bring up a list of all previous and future games.  With these changes it would be a 5 star app. For now it deserves a solid 3
reviews.author: Tomi Marc

reviews.title: Check permissions!!
reviews.comment: I\'m sorry but why do they need to record audio/video or take pictures on my phone?? Slightly creepy guys. Please explain.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Updated scores and works well on galaxy note.

reviews.comment: The web page/app still doesn\'t fill the whole screen after the update. (but at least it loads on jelly bean) Would love this to be native.

reviews.title: Permissions
reviews.comment: Good point made below - why give permission to take photos and videos from my phone - thats pretty dodgy and I dont see how that is needed for this app

reviews.title: Permission explanation
reviews.comment: Not bad, but please explain why you need to access my camera!? There is no update log at all. I won\'t be updating to the latest version just yet.

reviews.title: Overall Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Good footy app. Only gives player stats in terms of goals, nothing else. Would love detail in that area. As well as supercoach and dreamteam points. Add these three things and easily a 5 star app.
